Entries.Introduction: Ah, the new farmer we've all been expecting... and whose arrival has sparked many a conversation!#$b#I'm Buoy... I live in the lighthouse by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'll see you back in the valley.
Entries.Resort_Leaving_2: Hopefully a crab hasn't snuck onto my back again.$s#$b#Imagine crawling all over a buoy and finding yourself on a beach hundreds of miles from home!$h#$e#Hmmm... Perhaps this could make for an interesting adventure story, just like the one I once did...
Entries.Resort_Chair: I'm just taking a quick break. Sometimes even the smallest break can be exactly the thing you needed the most.$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Bobby, I'll order a round for everyone!#$b#*hic*... Oh... I don't have the G.$s#$b#Heh heh... Never mind!
Entries.Resort_Wander: I've heard rumours of pirates coming to shore near here at night. They say it can get pretty wild! I would love to see that.
Entries.Resort: I must admit, this beach blows my own humble strand out of the water.
Entries.Resort_2: Oh dear! Some seaweed has tangled itself in my handle.#$e#That's the trouble with relaxing on the beach.
Entries.divorced: ...$s#$e#Why would you do that to me? Can't you see you've shattered all my hopes and dreams?$s
Entries.dumped_Guys: Give me more time. It still really hurts.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: My heart hurt as much as the sea is deep... but I'm willing to leave the past behind us.$s
Entries.breakUp: Ah... the wilted bouquet. A sight I'd hoped to never see...$s#$b#I suppose there are other horizons to set my eyes upon...$s
Entries.Mon: I'm kind of new to this town myself, but I really feel at home.$h#$e#My dad, the Captain, brought me here only a year before you.
Entries.Mon4: No me and buff buoy are not related - why do you ask?
Entries.Tue: A great idea can pass through your head when you least expect it... but if your mind is too busy you might miss it.#$e#Well, I really must get back to my work.
Entries.Tue6: The sweet friction of pen and paper is the music of my soul.$u#$b#That's why I chose this beach as my home, so that I could have peace and quiet to think about my adventures and write them down.
Entries.Wed: The forest is a wonderful place. Something I have never seen before I came here. Have you been there?
Entries.Wed8: Sorry, I'm feeling lost today.$s#$e#I wish there was more certainty about the future.$s#$e#I don't want to grow old as a lonely buoy on this beach...$s
Entries.Thu2: I can't seem to find the right inspiration to begin writing my novel...$s
Entries.Thu4: I've been feeling less lost lately. Perhaps the weather is changing.
Entries.Thu6: Often I wonder if I might just have an inflated self-image and no real skills...$s#$e#No, no... I'm not fishing for compliments. Though they are always appreciated...
Entries.Thu8: #$1 elliottApol#It's a little lonely out here on the beach... so I apologize if I was ever a little too forward with you when we first met. I was just eager to have a friend.$k#$e#It feels good to have a close friend like you.
Entries.Fri: The fresh air of this valley is good for your mind.#$e#A quick swim outdoors always invigorates me.
Entries.Fri4: Do you like the sea? Maybe a new adventure waits for us out there...$8
Entries.Fri8: I'll admit... it takes me several hours each morning to roll out of bed.
Entries.Sat: You probably wouldn't like it inside my cabin. It's dark and full of sand.$s
Entries.Sat4: Please excuse the sorry state of my cabin.
Entries.Sat6: Some people are shy. Keep showing interest in them and they'll get comfortable around you.#$e#Everyone likes to have friends, even that grumpy blacksmith.
Entries.Sun: Hello. I hope your new farming life is panning out as you'd hoped?
Entries.Sun6: Oh, @! I was hoping you'd show up.#$e#It's always a pleasure to see you.$h
Entries.event_idea1: Mystery, huh? It's definitely an exciting genre. I'll remember that.
Entries.event_idea2: Ah, one of the classic genres. I'll remember that.
Entries.event_idea3: I would've never guessed! I know more about water than stars but I can research..$h#$b#I'll remember that.
Entries.event_boat1: ... I was worried you might not feel this way about a buoy.$l^So am I.$l
Entries.event_toast2: That's a great idea!$h#$b#Here's to us!
Entries.event_toast4: Ah, to a harmonious future for the community... what a virtuous idea.#$b#Here's to Pelican Town!
Entries.summer_Mon: A gentle little sunbeam woke me up this morning. I've never felt so refreshed.$u#$e#I'm sorry if that isn't very interesting to you.
Entries.summer_Mon4: I know that I am kind of an 'oddbuoy'.#$e#I hope you don't mind.$h
Entries.summer_Mon6: @, I know you have faith in my abilities as a writer. That means a lot to me.$h
Entries.summer_Tue: I've encountered some beautiful shells in front of my house.#$e#I would imagine the rarer varieties to be quite valuable.
Entries.summer_Tue6: I write in hopes of connecting with others through time and space.$u#$e#*sigh*...times are changing, though. People don't read anymore.$s
Entries.summer_Wed: It must be satisfying to follow your crop from seed to harvest.#$e#It's as if your essence is infused into the fruit.$u
Entries.summer_Thu: Oh dear! I have sand stuck all over me.$s#$e#That's the trouble with living on the beach.
Entries.summer_Fri: @? You look puzzled.#$b#I guess the hot summer air can make us a little dizzy.
Entries.summer_Sat: The sun is angry today... My body is a bit too delicate, I'm afraid.
Entries.summer_Sun: You came all the way here just to talk to me? How kind.$h
Entries.summer_Sun4: Visit my cabin whenever you like. I could use the company.$h
Entries.fall_Mon: Hello @.#$e#Make sure and take breaks from your work now and then.
Entries.fall_Mon4: Come visit me if you need a break from your labors.$h#$e#I'm usually at my house.
Entries.fall_Tue: It's been said that a pirate's ship, full of plundered gold, shipwrecked here a long time ago.
Entries.fall_Tue8: @, I was just thinking about you.$l#$e#Maybe you sensed it.$h#$e#So! Tell me about your day.
Entries.fall_Wed8: I wouldn't mind trying out farming.#$e#The quiet atmosphere of a farm might be a good source of literary inspiration, don't you think?$h
Entries.fall_Thu: Oh dear! A tiny crab canâ€™t stop hugging me.$l#$e#That's the fun with living on the beach.
Entries.fall_Fri4: My bottom is stiff from sitting at my writing desk all night.$s#$e#Sometimes I envy you, @.
Entries.fall_Fri: My bottom is stiff from sitting at my writing desk all morning.$s
Entries.fall_Fri10: @, when you're around... I feel unusually creative.$l#$e#I know... strange, but it's true.
Entries.fall_Sat: It gets windy this time of year. Marvelous!$h
Entries.fall_Sun: I have to remember to water my plants today. And not with sea water this time!
Entries.winter_Mon: You've come to visit me in the cold?#$e#I could do with a respite from my lonely labors.
Entries.winter_Mon4: @, you've trudged through the snow to visit me?#$e#I'm honored!$h
Entries.winter_Tue: People have scraped a living off the sea for thousands of years.#$e#I just go to the Captain and get the best stories.$h
Entries.winter_Tue10: @, I had a feeling that you would show up.#$e#Perhaps we're connected by an other-worldly thread.$l
Entries.-winter_Wed: A day can never be boring when you follow the whims of your imagination.$u#$e#Sorry, am I babbling on about nonsense?
Entries.winter_Thu: Breathe deeply. Do you notice it? That's the smell of the sea.#$e#How does it make you feel?
Entries.winter_Thu6: Breathe deeply. Do you notice it? That's the smell of the sea.#$e#Whenever I smell the sea, it reminds me of my adventure. The ocean really is full of stories.
Entries.winter_Fri: My friend, the gull sometimes needs a lot of attention.#$e#But it is nice to have a companion that helps me get around.$h#$e#I like that little guy.
Entries.winter_Sat: I've been doing little indoor chores, since it's often too cold to go out.#$e#Sorry if it's a little humid in the cabin.$s
Entries.winter_Sun: I never wanna scrub my floorboards. I think an algae is starting to form.$s#$e#Do you make time for cleaning?
